name: minecrafthawkeye
description: Minecraft bot for equations when shooting an arrow

scripts.docker: docker build -t docker_minecraft_hawk_eye . && docker run --rm -it --name docker_minecraft_hawk_eye_client  -v ~/.gitconfig:/etc/gitconfig -v $PWD:/home/app -w /home/app -u node -p 9992:9992 docker_minecraft_hawk_eye /bin/bash
scripts.start_server_test: docker build -t docker_minecraft_hawk_eye . && docker run --rm -it --name docker_minecraft_hawk_eye_test_server -v $PWD:/home/app -w /home/app -u node -p 25565:25565 docker_minecraft_hawk_eye ts-node test/common/start_test_server.ts

author: Sefirosweb
